posts.post_content: This is what I always want to see in my U/B/W resurrection deck. Lets me dig deep enough to find atleast one thing that I want to toss, and gives me more cards than I have to discard. Along with that, I can decide how many cards I want to discard depending on when I play it. Ideal I say.

posts.post_content:
Each *Time Spiral* card was an homage to at least one previously printed card.  
  
This card is referencing [Careful Study](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Careful Study) and is part of a cycle of Instants who's effects are stronger if cast 'as sorceries.'
posts.html:
Each Time Spiral card was an homage to at least one previously printed card.

This card is referencing Careful Study and is part of a cycle of Instants who's effects are stronger if cast 'as sorceries.'
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Missile_Penguin (3/11/2012 1:52:58 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I agree with Biggles that this is great in a deck built around [Megrim](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Megrim) (or now, [Liliana's Caress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Liliana's Caress)). It doesn't even need [Underworld Dreams](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Underworld Dreams) to be a finisher. It that type of deck, it is far superior to cards like [Fugue](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fugue) because the discard is guaranteed, which it often isn't in the late game, when hands are more likely to be empty. If you run 4x Liliana's Caress in your deck, there's a good chance you'll have two of them out by the time you play this. I've seen it used as a fourth - fifth turn finisher (with a lucky draw) in casual matches.  
  
Oh, and it can be a great draw spell for you, too. It's just a very solid, versatile card. I give it four stars. .
posts.html:

I've seen it used as a fourth - fifth turn finisher (with a lucky draw) in casual matches.

Oh, and it can be a great draw spell for you, too. It's just a very solid, versatile card. I give it four stars. .

posts.post_content: Strictly better than [Concentrate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Concentrate). It's concentrate during your main phase like normal, or you can have the flexibility of looting 2 times at instant speed.

posts.post_content: Agreed that its not strictly better than concentrate. But I'd use this more often since I can target my partner in multiplayer. Also, picking 2 from 4 can be very advantageous over just drawing 3 in most formats like EDH, and it plays well with a deck where you make your graveyard matter.
